pages.text: The time within a Vault can be $(l)extended$() by eating Vault Fruit.$(br2)The caviat of eating Vault Fruit is that it $(l)reduces$() the $(l)maximum health$() of the player by $(l)10%$().$(br2)Vault Fruits can't be eaten when the Vault is cursed with $(l)Rotten$().

pages.title: Vault Fruits
pages.text: The different Vault Fruits are:$(br)$(li)$(l)Sweet Kiwi$()$(li2)+10 Seconds Vault Time$()$(br)$(li)$(l)Bitter Lemmon$()$(li2)+30 Seconds Vault Time$()$(br)$(li)$(l)Sour Orange$()$(li2)+60 Seconds Vault Time$()
